farming.","kind":"dev","methods":{"addLiquidity(uint256)":{"details":"Add liquidity to the contract.","params":{"w2rAmount":"Amount of W2R tokens to add as liquidity. Requires sending Matic along with the transaction. Emits an AddLiquidity event."}},"checkIfAuthorizedInLPcontract(address)":{"details":"Check if the given address is authorized as a minter and burner in the LP token contract.","params":{"_toCheck":"The address to check for authorization in the LP token contract."},"returns":{"_0":"A boolean value indicating whether the address is authorized as a minter and burner."}},"constructor":{"details":"Constructor that initializes the contract with the token addresses, initial swap rate, Vault W2R address, and LP token address.","params":{"W2RAddress":"Address of the W2R token contract.","_vaultW2RAddress":"Address of the Vault W2R contract.","initialSwapRate":"Initial swap rate for Matic to W2R conversion.","lpTokenAddress":"Address of the LP token contract."}},"distributeTestW2R(bytes32)":{"details":"Distribute 2000 W2R tokens to the caller as a tester once per day, only on Amoy Testnet. Owner can set testAmount to 0 to disable this function.","params":{"ipHash":"The keccak256 hash of the caller's IP address."}},"exitFarm()":{"details":"Exit farm and claim LP tokens back. Emits an ExitFarm event."},"farm(uint256)":{"details":"Farm LP tokens to earn W2R rewards.","params":{"lpAmount":"Amount of LP tokens to farm. Emits a Farm event."}},"getContractBalances()":{"details":"Get the contract balances for W2R, MATIC, and LP tokens.","returns":{"_0":"A tuple containing the W2R, MATIC, and LP token balances of the contract."}},"getUserBalances()":{"details":"Get the user balances for W2R and LP tokens.","returns":{"_0":"A tuple containing the W2R and LP token balances of the caller."}},"harvest()":{"details":"Claim W2R rewards from farming. Emits a Harvest event."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"removeLiquidity(uint256)":{"details":"Remove liquidity from the contract.","params":{"lpAmount":"Amount of LP tokens to remove liquidity. Emits a RemoveLiquidity event."}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setAnnualYieldPercentage(uint256)":{"details":"Set the reward rate for farming.","params":{"_newPercentage":"New annual yield percentage."}},"setSecurityPercentage(uint256)":{"details":"Set the security percentage for the contract.","params":{"_newSecurityPercentage":"New security percentage (must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100)."}},"setSwapRate(uint256)":{"details":"Update the Matic to W2R swap rate.","params":{"newSwapRate":"New swap rate for Matic to W2R conversion."}},"setTestAmount(uint256)":{"details":"Set the amount of W2R tokens to be distributed during testing. Can only be called by the contract owner.","params":{"_amount":"The new test amount to be distributed (in W2R tokens). Must be greater or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10,000 W2R."}},"swapMaticForW2R()":{"details":"Swap Matic for W2R tokens. Requires sending Matic along with the transaction. Emits a SwapMaticForW2R event."},"swapW2RForMatic(uint256)":{"details":"Swap W2R tokens for Matic tokens.","params":{"w2rAmount":"Amount of W2R tokens to swap for Matic tokens. Emits a SwapW2RForMatic event."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"viewRewards()":{"details":"View the pending W2R rewards for the user.","returns":{"_0":"reward The pending W2R rewards for the user."}},"withdrawMaticFeesToVault()":{"details":"Withdraw accumulated Matic fees for the vault."},"withdrawW2RFeesToVault()":{"details":"Withdraw accumulated W2R fees to the vault."}},"title":"MaticW2Rdex","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/MaticW2Rdex.sol":"MaticW2Rdex"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"project:/contracts/MaticW2Rdex.sol":{"keccak256":"0xba4270b394b94a156de4ff58deabef0b07fde618cd69fb222790ce47443f463a","license":"CC-BY-4.0","urls":["bzz-raw://fc28802837d72d2275df447fd82ab212429ae8283fe0e27486b07ccedbcf00f7","dweb:/ipfs/QmdUs6KwR1w7NhBP4PwHCk9GNv2cJsj7Bv9atbQq1iw8Rr"]},"project:/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa94b34880e3c1b0b931662cb1c09e5dfa6662f31cba80e07c5ee71cd135c9673","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://40fb1b5102468f783961d0af743f91b9980cf66b50d1d12009f6bb1869cea4d2","dweb:/ipfs/QmYqEbJML4jB1GHbzD4cUZDtJg5wVwNm3vDJq1GbyDus8y"]},"project:/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/security/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x190dd6f8d592b7e4e930feb7f4313aeb8e1c4ad3154c27ce1cf6a512fc30d8cc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4ce8dfb62d0c4fa260d6eec8f1cd47f5f2a044e11bde5b31d18072fa6e7d9010","dweb:/ipfs/QmTyFztU3tLEcEDnqqiaW4UJetqsU77LXc6pjc9oTXCK5u"]},"project:/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4ffc0547c02ad22925310c585c0f166f8759e2648a09e9b489100c42f15dd98d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://15f52f51413a9de1ff191e2f6367c62178e1df7806d7880fe857a98b0b66253d","dweb:/ipfs/QmaQG1fwfgUt5E9nu2cccFiV47B2V78MM1tCy1qB7n4MsH"]},"project:/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9750c6b834f7b43000631af5cc30001c5f547b3ceb3635488f140f60e897ea6b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5a7d5b1ef5d8d5889ad2ed89d8619c09383b80b72ab226e0fe7bde1636481e34","dweb:/ipfs/QmebXWgtEfumQGBdVeM6c71McLixYXQP5Bk6kKXuoY4Bmr"]},"project:/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/ERC20Burnable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0d19410453cda55960a81 devdoc.author: Crypt0zaurus https://www.linkedin.com/in/maxence-a-a82081260
devdoc.details: A decentralized exchange for swapping Matic and W2R tokens, providing liquidity and farming.

params.w2rAmount: Amount of W2R tokens to add as liquidity. Requires sending Matic along with the transaction. Emits an AddLiquidity event.

checkIfAuthorizedInLPcontract(address).details: Check if the given address is authorized as a minter and burner in the LP token contract.

params._toCheck: The address to check for authorization in the LP token contract.

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the address is authorized as a minter and burner.

constructor.details: Constructor that initializes the contract with the token addresses, initial swap rate, Vault W2R address, and LP token address.

params.W2RAddress: Address of the W2R token contract.
params._vaultW2RAddress: Address of the Vault W2R contract.
params.initialSwapRate: Initial swap rate for Matic to W2R conversion.
params.lpTokenAddress: Address of the LP token contract.

distributeTestW2R(bytes32).details: Distribute 2000 W2R tokens to the caller as a tester once per day, only on Amoy Testnet. Owner can set testAmount to 0 to disable this function.

params.ipHash: The keccak256 hash of the caller's IP address.

exitFarm().details: Exit farm and claim LP tokens back. Emits an ExitFarm event.

farm(uint256).details: Farm LP tokens to earn W2R rewards.

params.lpAmount: Amount of LP tokens to farm. Emits a Farm event.

getContractBalances().details: Get the contract balances for W2R, MATIC, and LP tokens.

returns._0: A tuple containing the W2R, MATIC, and LP token balances of the contract.

getUserBalances().details: Get the user balances for W2R and LP tokens.

returns._0: A tuple containing the W2R and LP token balances of the caller.

harvest().details: Claim W2R rewards from farming. Emits a Harvest event.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.lpAmount: Amount of LP tokens to remove liquidity. Emits a RemoveLiquidity event.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAnnualYieldPercentage(uint256).details: Set the reward rate for farming.

setSecurityPercentage(uint256).details: Set the security percentage for the contract.

params._newSecurityPercentage: New security percentage (must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100).

setSwapRate(uint256).details: Update the Matic to W2R swap rate.

params.newSwapRate: New swap rate for Matic to W2R conversion.

setTestAmount(uint256).details: Set the amount of W2R tokens to be distributed during testing. Can only be called by the contract owner.

params._amount: The new test amount to be distributed (in W2R tokens). Must be greater or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10,000 W2R.

swapMaticForW2R().details: Swap Matic for W2R tokens. Requires sending Matic along with the transaction. Emits a SwapMaticForW2R event.

swapW2RForMatic(uint256).details: Swap W2R tokens for Matic tokens.

params.w2rAmount: Amount of W2R tokens to swap for Matic tokens. Emits a SwapW2RForMatic event.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

viewRewards().details: View the pending W2R rewards for the user.

returns._0: reward The pending W2R rewards for the user.

withdrawMaticFeesToVault().details: Withdraw accumulated Matic fees for the vault.

withdrawW2RFeesToVault().details: Withdraw accumulated W2R fees to the vault.

devdoc.title: MaticW2Rdex
